thread.title: Woman faces charges for driving drunk with kids in vehicle
thread.title_full: Woman faces charges for driving drunk with kids in vehicle

title: Woman faces charges for driving drunk with kids in vehicle
text:
Published By: Billings Gazette: Crimewatch - Today 
A woman was arrested and charged after police allegedly found her intoxicated and driving with her two young children in the car....
